thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Advanced Digital Technology sees FY 2017 net profit down 24.4 pct to 29.4 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Advanced Digital Technology sees FY 2017 net profit down 24.4 pct to 29.4 pct

organizations.name: beijing advanced digital technology co ltd

text:
Jan 30(Reuters) - Beijing Advanced Digital Technology Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 24.4 percent to 29.4 percent, or to be 42 million yuan to 45 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 59.5 million yuan
* Says decreases gross margin of IT infrastructure related business is the main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/GqkruY
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
